title: Jennifer Arcuri mocks Piers Morgan over his sex life and asks if he's fallen in love with her
text:

Piers Morgan was left red-faced during an interview with Jennifer Arcuri when he was asked about his sex life.

The American businesswoman turned the tables on the Good Morning Britain host when asked about her "intimate relationship" with Boris Johnson /

The Prime Minister's former pal swerved questions over whether they had a sexual relationship when he was Mayor of London.

But the roles were reversed when Ms Arcuri asked the outspoken presenter about his sexual exploits while married.

She then asked embarrassed Piers whether he had fallen in love with her - having previously claimed men fall for her in just ten minutes.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Piers asked: "Did you ever have any intimate relationship with Boris Johnson? Given the allegations of impropriety?"

Switching the topic, Ms Arcuri replied: "Do you want me to talk about your sex life?

"Because I would love to ask you a few questions. About who you worked with and were married and then decided to…you know."

(Image: ITV)

Stunned Piers suggested they could talk about his own sex life "another time", adding: "I'm not the one accused of impropriety with Boris Johnson when he was Mayor of London."

Giggling Ms Arcuri asked: "Has it been 10 minutes yet? Are you falling in love with me?"

Piers' co-host Susanna Reid then also mockingly asked if he was falling in love with the American businesswoman.

(Image: ITV)

Ms Arcuri repeatedly refused to answer the direct question about a sexual relationship with the now PM.

She added: "Because the press have made me this objectified ex-model pole dancer, I really am not going to answer that question.

"I’m not going to put myself in a position for you to weaponise my answer. I'm being used as a pawn."

(Image: ITV)

Taking to Twitter , one viewer said: "The girl talking about @BorisJohnson is being open and honest. Piers Morgan building up to drilling her again. His approach makes people feel uncomfortable. When will @gmb get a better host?"

"Morgans interview is embarrassing #gmb Digging and digging rather crudely," added another.

A third said: "Hahahahaha Morgan ain't getting what he wants from this woman hahahahaha he seriously is trying to get blood out of a stone ..morgan is really scraping the bottom of the barrel now"

Good Morning Britain viewers were surprised by Pier's conduct during the interview and took to Twitter with their complaints.

"Jennifer Arcuri gone off on a 10 minute monologue... never ever known @piersmorgan to be so silent," said one viewer.

Another added: "Jennifer Arcuri on #gmb well rehearsed story, come on @piersmorgan challenge her. Something's not right."

"What is the point of an interview where the interviewee is giving a monologue with no challenge," said a third.

A fourth agreed: "This is the quietest I’ve ever seen @piersmorgan"

*Good Morning Britain airs weekdays on ITV at 6am
description: The American businesswoman turned the tables on red-faced Piers Morgan when asked about her 'intimate relationship' with Boris Johnson
